Class enemyMovement

java.lang.Object
game.enemyMovement
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, EventListener
public class enemyMovement extends Object implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
The animation for the short-ranged enemy.

  • Constructor Details

    • enemyMovement

      public enemyMovement(Enemy enemy, Player player, boolean isLoaded)
      Initialises the animation of the walker enemy.

      creates and loads the animations for the walk animation updates the animation after short delays. Sets left and right bounds of movement.

      Parameters:
      enemy - the shooter enemy
      player - the current player
      isLoaded - tracks if level was saved and loaded

  • Method Details

    • loadWalkFrame

      public void loadWalkFrame()
      loads the walk frames.

      for each of the frames in the walk array, display the image

    • move

      public void move()
      enemy walking.

      if the enemy position is less that left then walk right, else walk left.

    • collide

      public void collide(city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent e)
      collision method.

      if the enemy comes in contact with the player and the damage is true, the player loses a life.

      Specified by:
      collide in interface city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
      Parameters:
      e - The CollisionEvent contains details about the collision.

    • setSaved

      public void setSaved(boolean saved)
      Sets the save action.
      Parameters:
      saved - the save action as a Boolean

    • isSaved

      public boolean isSaved()
      Gets the save action.
      Returns:
      the save action as a Boolean
